statusDetails.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/users

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 422: Unprocessable Entity

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/users
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "cookie": "orangehrm=5ca309f4c6491bae7d76998a21695a1f",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 98
}
Body: {"empNumber":2,"password":"admin1234","status":true,"userRoleId":2,"username":"ALAA1696337747577"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity
Headers: {
  "server": "nginx",
  "date": "Tue, 03 Oct 2023 12:55:48 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "transfer-encoding": "chunked",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "cache-control": "no-cache, private",
  "x-content-type-options": "nosniff",
  "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block"
}
Body: {
  "error": {
    "status": "422",
    "message": "Invalid Parameter",
    "data": {
      "invalidParamKeys": [
        "empNumber"
      ]
    }
  }
}
